build-an-etherscan-service.title: Build an Etherscan service
build-an-etherscan-service.intro: In this sharing, I will introduce the required APIs in Etherscan service, list some possible solutions, and compare those pros and cons. After that, illustrate our current design and future works.

blockchain.title: Blockchain
blockchain.intro: Blockchain is a hot topic right now, but to often the focus is on ICOs and token trading. In this track we want to showcase uses of Blockchain that go beyond tokens and solve real world problems.
